title: Harvest time
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Canada - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Canada - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Wine and wine making
description: Cinemagazine newsreel items including: 1. Ten Thousand Eggs a Day: A big pie-shaped henhouse in Nova Scotia produces eggs with assembly-line regularity. 2. Harvest on the Vine: A look at the Niagara wine industry shows how grapes are pressed and processed into Canadian wine. 3. Follow That Sheep: At Kamloops, British Columbia, a trek to the mountains with seven thousand sheep and two canny sheep dogs.
